lead_paragraph: BRENNAN--Gregory L.,on July 20, 2016. Devoted husband of the late Barbara. Loving father of Mark and his wife Anne and the late Matthew. Cherished brother of Thomas and the late John and Joseph. Dear uncle of twenty eight nieces and nephews. Family to receive friends at Frank E. Campbell, The Funeral Chapel, 1076 Madison Avenue (81st Street), Sunday 1-4pm. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BRENNAN, GREGORY L.
